column4: heeeeeeeelp can anyone tell me how to install flashplayer for firefox
the installer is broken right now download the tar file from adove and install it per the instructions, it should work fine.
gnash doesn't work with youtube and some other popular flash sites, as far as i know.
im on a 64bit is there a 64bit installer
i can't remember how to purge a program, i'm sure someone here knows
manually that was before i managet to connect to internet
so you installed it from source?
i downloaded the pack from packages.ubuntu yse
that doesn't mean you installed from source.. did you download a .deb file, or a tar.gz file
ok, then sudo apt-get remove wine should work, if you want to purge it...
: i did that to wine and automatix, they just stay on my menu
on the terminal it shows that they are not installed
